Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This product holds immense value to us and has been meticulously designed to cater to your needs. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. We believe this price reflects the quality and value of the product while also providing you with an excellent opportunity to acquire it at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
